definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Vico is the first theoretician who demonstrated the primitive thinking in the idealistic history.
sentences.chinese: 维柯是思想史上第一个论证原始思维的理论家。

sentences.english: 1983-1986, M. A. in Ancient Chinese History of Political Thought, Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 1986年，北京大学，中国古代政治思想史硕士。

sentences.english: It is very important for geographers to know and understand the history of geographical ideas.
sentences.chinese: 地理学思想史研究对地理学学科发展具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Huiyuan is an important figure in the history of Chinese Buddhism and Chinese thought.
sentences.chinese: 慧远是中国佛教史乃至中国思想史上的重要人物。

sentences.english: As an undergraduate, taking a course in the history of economic thought and reading Malthus.
sentences.chinese: 大学时，我选修过经济思想史，读过马尔萨斯的著作。

sentences.english: Tan Qiao and his work Hua Shu occupied an important position in ideological history of Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 谭峭及其《化书》在中国道教思想史上占有重要地位。

sentences.english: The intermingling of the theory of mind and nature in Daoism and Buddhism is a big problem in the history of Chinese thought.
sentences.chinese: 道佛心性论的互动是中国思想史的重大问题。

sentences.english: Examples can also be found in European intellectual history.
sentences.chinese: 类似的例子可以在欧洲思想史中找到。

sentences.english: The research about political ideology history of Chinese run through Lu Zhenyu's learning career.
sentences.chinese: 中国政治思想史研究贯穿吕振羽学术生涯始终。

sentences.english: But the history of thought shows us that many people were totally committed to absurd beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 但是，思想史告诉我们，许多人完全虔信荒唐的信仰。

sentences.english: Confucius and Plato are VIPs in the early human intellectual history.
sentences.chinese: 孔子和柏拉图是早期人类思想史中的重要人物。

sentences.english: Marx constructing historical materialism is the apotheosis of theory innovation in human anamnesis history.
sentences.chinese: 马克思创立唯物史观是人类思想史上理论创新的典范。

sentences.english: Confucius and Plato are the great masters in the early history of thought.
sentences.chinese: 孔子和柏拉图是早期人类思想史中的重要人物。

sentences.english: Liang Shuming is thinking of the history of China can not be neglected figure.
sentences.chinese: 梁漱溟是中国思想史上不可忽视的人物。

sentences.english: His thought and personality have particular values in Chinese ideological history.
sentences.chinese: 嵇康的思想与人格在思想史上有其独特的价值。

sentences.english: Now here is a big glop of intellectual history.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们来大致回顾一下人类思想史。

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
